steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Select the text that you want to hide.
Right-click on the selected text and choose 'Font' from the context menu.
In the 'Font' dialog box, check the 'Hidden' checkbox.
Click 'OK' to apply the changes and close the dialog box.
To unhide the text, select the hidden text.
Right-click on the selected text and choose 'Font' from the context menu.
In the 'Font' dialog box, uncheck the 'Hidden' checkbox.
Click 'OK' to apply the changes and close the dialog box.
